sentences.sentence: Exelon Corp. will explore building a new nuclear reactor downstate.
sentences.translation: 美国爱克斯龙电力公司会在州的最南部研发建造一个新的核反应堆。

sentences.sentence: Tredegar Corp. has cut its work force to about 850 from 1,300 in 2007.
sentences.translation: 卓德嘉集团将2007年时拥有的1300名员工的团队裁至850人左右。

sentences.sentence: Starbucks Corp. is at it again.
